CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Invests primarily in companies with market capitalisations below USD300m, with the aim of exploiting the potential for higher returns. Up to 35% of the funds total assets may be invested in non-Microcap companies equity securities and non-convertible debt securities.
